get a work item.name: Get a Work Item
get a work item.description: Returns the content of the work item

parameters.documentation: ID of the work item to retrieve.
parameters.label: ID

parameters.documentation: Gets work item relationships (work item links, hyperlinks and file attachements).
parameters.label: Expand

get a list of work items.name: Get a List of Work Items
get a list of work items.description: Retrieves a list of the work items.
get a list of work items.stepName: get a list of work items

parameters.documentation: A comma-separated list of up to 200 IDs of the work items to get.
parameters.label: IDs

parameters.documentation: A comma-separated list of up to 100 fields to get with each work item. If not specified, all fields with values are returned. Calculated fields such as Attached File Count must be specifically queried for using this parameter.
parameters.label: Fields

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
parameters.documentation: Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
parameters.label: As of (date)

parameters.documentation: Gets work item relationships (work item links, hyperlinks, file attachements, etc.).
parameters.label: Expand relationships

parameters.documentation: Determines if the call will throw an error when encountering a work item (default behavior) that doesn't exist or simply omit it.
parameters.label: Strict mode

upload a work item attachment.name: Upload a Work Item Attachment
upload a work item attachment.description: To attach a file to a work item, upload the attachment to the attachment store, then attach it to the work item.

parameters.documentation: ID of the work item.
parameters.label: Work Item ID

parameters.documentation: Comment for the attachment
parameters.label: Comment

parameters.documentation: The name of the file in the attachment store (typically the same as the name of the source of the attachment).
parameters.label: Attachment filename

parameters.documentation: Default is simple. Use chunked upload type for uploading large files (>130 MB).
parameters.label: Upload type

parameters.documentation: Path to the file to be uploaded. Either this field or file content field must be specified.
parameters.label: File path

parameters.documentation: File content to be uploaded. Either this field or file path field must be specified.
parameters.label: File content

parameters.documentation: ID of the work item to delete.
parameters.label: ID

parameters.documentation: If checked, the procedure will fail in case the item does not exist.
parameters.label: Strict mode

parameters.documentation: Short description of the work item.
parameters.label: Title

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Name or ID of a team project where the work item should be created.
parameters.documentation: Name or ID of a team project where the work item should be created.
parameters.label: Project name

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Name of the work item type.
parameters.documentation: Name of the work item type.
parameters.label: Type

parameters.documentation: Priority for completing the work item, based on business goals
parameters.label: Priority

parameters.documentation: The person currently assigned to the work item.
parameters.label: Assign to

parameters.documentation: Description for the work item
parameters.label: Description

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Additional fields to be added, e.g. {"Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Severity": 2}. For field names see https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/docs/integrate/api/wit/work-item-types
parameters.documentation:
Additional fields to be added, e.g. {"Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Severity": 2}.
For field names see https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/docs/integrate/api/wit/work-item-types
parameters.label: Additional fields

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Pre-set request body, e.g. [{"op": "add", "path": "/relations/-", "value": {"rel": "System.LinkTypes.Hierarchy-Reverse", "url": "https://fabrikam-fiber-inc.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/_apis/wit/workItems/297", "attributes": {"comment": "decomposition of work"} } } ]
parameters.documentation: Pre-set request body, e.g. [{"op": "add", "path": "/relations/-", "value": {"rel": "System.LinkTypes.Hierarchy-Reverse", "url": "https://fabrikam-fiber-inc.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/_apis/wit/workItems/297", "attributes": {"comment": "decomposition of work"} } } ]
parameters.label: Request body

parameters.documentation: Team project ID or name.
parameters.label: Project

parameters.documentation: The ID or the name of the definition. This is required.
parameters.label: Definition ID or name

parameters.documentation: The ID or the name of the queue. This is optional. If not specified, the default queue for the definition will be used.
parameters.label: Queue ID or name

parameters.documentation: The branch to build. This is optional. If not specified, the default branch for the definition will be used.
parameters.label: Source branch

parameters.documentation: If checked, the procedure will wait for build to finish.
parameters.label: Wait for build

parameters.documentation: Timeout in second to wait for build to finish. Will be used if "Wait for build" is checked.
parameters.label: Wait timeout

parameters.documentation: If checked, the procedure status will mimic build status. If build has failed, the procedure status will be "Failed", if build has succeeded, the status will be "Success" and "Warning" otherwize.
parameters.label: Mimic build status

parameters.htmlDocumentation:
Parameters to pass to the build. This is optional.
E.g., 
{"system.debug":"true","BuildConfiguration":"debug","BuildPlatform":"x64"}
If not specified, the default variables for the definition will be used.
parameters.label: Parameters

parameters.documentation: ID of the work item to be updated.
parameters.label: Item ID

parameters.documentation: Short description of the work item.
parameters.label: Title

parameters.documentation: Priority for completing the work item, based on business goals
parameters.label: Priority

parameters.documentation: The person currently assigned to the work item.
parameters.label: Assign to

parameters.documentation: Description for the work item
parameters.label: Description

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Additional fields to be added, e.g. {"Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Severity": 2}. For field names see https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/docs/integrate/api/wit/work-item-types
parameters.documentation:
Additional fields to be added, e.g. {"Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Severity": 2}.
For field names see https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/docs/integrate/api/wit/work-item-types
parameters.label: Additional fields

parameters.htmlDocumentation: Pre-set request body, e.g. [{"op": "add", "path": "/relations/-", "value": {"rel": "System.LinkTypes.Hierarchy-Reverse", "url": "https://fabrikam-fiber-inc.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/_apis/wit/workItems/297", "attributes": {"comment": "decomposition of work"} } } ]
parameters.documentation: Pre-set request body, e.g. [{"op": "add", "path": "/relations/-", "value": {"rel": "System.LinkTypes.Hierarchy-Reverse", "url": "https://fabrikam-fiber-inc.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/_apis/wit/workItems/297", "attributes": {"comment": "decomposition of work"} } } ]
parameters.label: Request body

get default values.name: Get Default Values
get default values.description: Get the default values that will be filled in automatically when you create a new work item of a specific type.

parameters.documentation: Name or ID of a team project where the work item type is defined.
parameters.label: Project

parameters.documentation: Name of the work item type.
parameters.label: Work item type name
